column4: my power went out, and so my wifi was shutoff, but then when the power came back I couldn't figure out how to restart it, instead I had to logout and back in.  but I want to know how to restart it without logging out
you can bring it back up with iwconfig
ok, I tried that though, but I will check out the man page.  There isn't a gui app?
are you using gnome? in regular ubuntu?
